charges.charge_description: (Count 1) 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)(viii) DISTRIBUTION OF METHAMPHETAMINE; (Count 2) 21:841(a)(1) and 841(a)(1)(B)(viii) DISTRIBUTION OF METHAMPHETAMINE
21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) DISTRIBUTION OF 5 GRAMS OR MORE METHAMPHETAMINE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant pleaded guilty to count I of the Indictment and is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for 70 months with credit for time served; 4 years supervised release with special conditions; and a $100 special assessment

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) DISTRIBUTION OF 5 GRAMS OR MORE METHAMPHETAMINE(2-3)

charges.charge_disposition: Counts II, III and IV of the Indictment are dismissed on the motion of the United States as to this defendant only
Counts II, III and IV of the Indictment are dismissed on the motion of the United States as to this defendant only
